full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL GYI 'KHRUNGS RABS GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @061A *, ,(CES BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL GYI 'KHRUNGS RABS GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS DANG BCAS PA 'DI NI PHYAG MDZAD PA BLO BZANG DBANG RGYAL TSOG THU DA'I CHEN NO YON, ,SBYIN PA AER KHE NANG SO, ,BSTAN 'DZIN NOM CHE DGE BSGOS, ,'JAM DBYANGS THON GA LAG PI LIG THU BSTAN PA TSE RING HOR TSA PI LIGS THU RNAMS KYIS MDZAD BTAGS CHE BA, SMAN RNYING YUG MDZOD GOS SER GO YUG BSOD BTAGS LNGA BCAS BSTABS TE KHAL KHA DO LU'U KHO SHU'U GI SBYIN BDAG RGVA RIGS TSA MIG NGAG 'DON BGYIS CHOG PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG SNYOMS LAS PA BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYAL MTSOS PHO BRANG PO TA LA'I GZIMS CHUNG NYI 'OD @061B 'KHYIL BAR SBYAR BA'O, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO,
